org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice.text.Rule

  • Packages that use Rule 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice.text  

    • Uses of Rule in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice.text

      Methods in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.voice.text that return Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rule[] AbstractRuleBasedInterpreter.getRules(Locale locale)
      Retrieves all Rules to a given Locale.
      protected Rule AbstractRuleBasedInterpreter.itemRule(Object headExpression)
      Creates an item rule on base of an expression, where the tail of the new rule's expression will consist of an item name expression.
      protected Rule AbstractRuleBasedInterpreter.itemRule(Object headExpression, Object tailExpression)
      Creates an item rule on base of a head and a tail expression, where the middle part of the new rule's expression will consist of an item name expression.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void AbstractRuleBasedInterpreter.addRules(Locale locale, Rule... rules)
      Adds Locale specific rules to this interpreter.
